channel.title: CVE Feed for Unisoc (Shanghai) Technologies Co., Ltd. -- T606/T612/T616
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unisoc (Shanghai) Technologies Co., Ltd. -- T606/T612/T616

item.title: CVE-2023-40632|2024-09-19T18:40:15.360Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t606%2Ft612%2Ft616
item.description: In jpg driver, there is a possible use after free due to a logic error. This could lead to remote information disclosure no additional execution privileges needed

item.title: CVE-2023-40652|2024-09-19T18:09:40.765Z -- unisoc%20%28shanghai%29%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- t606%2Ft612%2Ft616
item.description: In jpg driver, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to local denial of service with System execution privileges needed
